```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
occurrence_raw <- read_csv("data/raw/bul_bul_downloads/occurrence_raw.txt")

table(occurrence_raw$taxon)

occurrence <- occurrence_raw %>% 
  mutate(decimalLatitude = latitude,
         decimalLongitude = longitude,
         establishmentMeans = NA,
         acceptedTaxonKey = 2486151,
         taxonKey = 2486151, 
         basisOfRecord = "HUMAN_OBSERVATION",
         taxonRank = "SPECIES",
         taxonomicStatus = "ACCEPTED",
         genus = "Pycnonotus",
         specificEpithet = "jocosus",
         eventDate = year,
         coordinateUncertaintyInMeters = 1,
         occurrenceStatus = "PRESENT",
         countryCode = NA,
         month = 1,
         day = 1,
         gbifID = NA)

write_tsv(occurrence, "./data/raw/bul_bul_downloads/occurrence.txt")
```
